sentences.en: a licence for the software
sentences.cn: 软件许可证

sentences.en: a multi-user software licence
sentences.cn: 多用户共享软件许可

sentences.en: For failing to report the accident, his licence was endorsed.
sentences.cn: 由于发生事故未能报告，他的驾驶执照被注明违章。

sentences.en: He also had his licence endorsed with eight penalty points.
sentences.cn: 他的驾驶执照也被扣了8分。

sentences.en: He is now the proud possessor of a driving licence.
sentences.cn: 他现在有了驾驶执照，颇有些飘飘然。

sentences.en: He lost his licence for six months.
sentences.cn: 他被吊销执照半年。

sentences.en: He was arrested for driving without a license.
sentences.cn: 他因无照驾驶被捕。

sentences.en: I forgot to renew my licence.
sentences.cn: 我忘记去办理执照展期了。

sentences.en: I soon learnt to read the licence plates' prefixes.
sentences.cn: 我很快就学会了识别牌照前面的代码。

sentences.en: I'm going to the off-licence to buy some whisky.
sentences.cn: 我去售酒商店买几瓶威士忌。

sentences.en: It transpired that Paolo had left his driving licence at home.
sentences.cn: 后来才知道保罗把驾照忘在家里了。

sentences.en: Payne lost his driving licence a year ago for drink-driving.
sentences.cn: 佩恩一年前因为酒后驾驶而被吊销了执照。

sentences.en: Persistent offenders face losing their licence.
sentences.cn: 多次违规者将会被没收执照。

sentences.en: The dealers applied for an export licence.
sentences.cn: 经销商申请了出口许可证。

sentences.en: The owner of land could grant a licence to cut and remove timber.
sentences.cn: 土地所有者可发执照授权砍伐和运走木材。

sentences.en: The painting was returned to Spain on a temporary import licence.
sentences.cn: 这幅画凭着临时进口许可证被送回了西班牙。

sentences.en: The Tennessee Valley Authority applied for a license to operate the facility.
sentences.cn: 田纳西河谷管理局申请了这个场所的经营执照。

sentences.en: This licence would not allow him to trade as a plc.
sentences.cn: 这个许可证并不能让他以公开股份有限公司的名义从事贸易。

sentences.en: to go through all the formalities necessary in order to get a gun licence
sentences.cn: 办理取得持枪执照的全部必要手续

sentences.en: When does your driving licence expire?
sentences.cn: 你的驾照什么时候到期？

sentences.en: You need an HGV licence for this job.
sentences.cn: 从事这项工作得有重型货车驾驶执照。

words.tran_cn: 得到许可的；领有执照的
领到执照的人；获许可的人
持牌人；执照持有者；获许可的人；领到执照的人
许可（licence的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 驾驶执照；汽车驾驶执照
出口许可证，输出许可证

trans.tran_en: an official document giving you permission to own or do something for a period of time
